content: This is the Zulip topic for discussion during the FHIR CAT 26 (2021-01) Isolation Bed Use Case Track

Remember that we kick off the FHIR CAT for this Isolation Bed Gemini track at 0900 today ... focus will be on detailing the use case and exploring various tools & FHIR resources / IG etc. that we can leverage, as well as related IHE FHIR-based profiles.
@John Rhoads FWIW I will not be able to join the track until closer to the start time of 0900 Pacific
Are y'all recording your sessions? I won't be able to make your track but I am interested in learning what y'all are working on.

@Camila Altman sorry but no, we aren't recording the sessions today - we are just working through the use case ... we'll be heads down doing that today and tomorrow ... but if you pop in and want to ask questions - go for it! We can always "take a break" ... probably will NEED a break!
Updated the Isolation Bed track schedule to join the V2-to-FHIR discussion at 1400 Pacific to review ORU mapping in detail ... join us!
Sorry saw this too late. Hopefully can catch the highlights tomorrow

Note that we have finished this track for this CAT 26 ... pretty spent at 11:30 Pacific Friday!!! Thanks for those who popped into the sessions ... we will be spending a bit more time today getting the notes pulled together - and before we forget EVERYTHING!!! See many of you next week and at the upcoming HL7 DEV WGMs!

Note this thread DeviceDefinition as CatalogEntry and the related discussion at the (FHIR CAT 2101-01 Isolation Track narrative) around application of the Point-of-Care Identity Management (IHE DEV PCIM) profile that takes this to the next step of managing the association/disassociation of devices and patients and the possible use of FHIR Workflow constructs ... to be discussed during tomorrow's HL7 DEV Devices on FHIR session Q1

For the next HL7 FHIR CAT 2021-05 event, we just posted a draft (VERY draft) proposal for the 2nd Isolation Point-of-Care Gemini Device Interoperability track. Please give it a look ... help fill in some of the blanks or leave comments re. what you would like explained or included. Note this is a continuation of the January '21 track and we plan to have the 3rd push in the 28th FHIR CAT later this year.
Not able to get into virtual meeting with the link that I have - "you'll join the call when someone lets you in". Anyone getting in?
